cause.description: From http://www.innocenceproject.org/: The Innocence Project is a national litigation and public policy organization dedicated to exonerating wrongfully convicted people through DNA testing and reforming the criminal justice system to prevent future injustice. Sign up for the Innocence Project's e-mail newsletter at: http://innocenceproject.org/signup 1. Everyone deserves justice.
cause.mission: To exonerate wrongfully convicted people through DNA testing and reform the criminal justice system to prevent injustice.
cause.name: The Innocence Project
